pageProduct.name: Olay Complete UV Protection Moisturiser Lotion Normal/Dry SPF15 150mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Complete UV Protection Moisturiser Lotion Normal/Dry SPF15 with Vitamin B3, Pro-B5 and E.

Formulated with Vitamin B3 & E and Pro-Vitamin B5 to help re-texture skin appearance for healthy looking skin

Size: 150ml

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Why is Complete Lotion Right for me?
Because it is a daily facial moisturiser that has been specially designed to give your skin what it needs to help maintain and improve the healthy look of your skin.
• How does it work?
It contains essential ingredients your skin needs:
• Nourishing OLAY moisture
• SPF 15 broad spectrum protection
• Skin pampering vitamins
• MOISTURISES
Non-greasy formula contains nourishing OLAY moisture that provides 24 hours lasting hydration.

PROTECTS
Provides SPF 15 and broad spectrum UV protection to help prevent premature skin aging.
• NOURISHING FORMULA
With Vitamins B3 & E and Pro-Vitamin B5, the formula helps re-texturise skin appearance for healthy looking skin.

SPF 15 UVA/UVB

SolaSheer TechnologyTM
Dermatologically Tested
Non-Comedogenic (Won't Clog Pores)
• Moisturises: Non greasy formula contains nourishing Olay moisture that provides up to 24 hours lasting hydration.
• Protects: Provides SPF 15 and broad spectrum UV protection to help prevent premature skin ageing.
• Vitamin Enriched: With Vitamins B3 & E and Pro-vitamin B5, it helps re-texturise skin appearance for healthy looking skin.

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. Use product only as directed. May be irritant to the eyes. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water. If skin irritation develops, discontinue use. For external use on unbroken skin only. Contains Benzyl Alcohol and hydroxybenzoates.

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
Octyl salicylate 4% w/w
Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane 2% w/w
Octocrylene 1% w/w
Phenylbenzimidazole sulfonic acid 1% w/w

PRESERVATIVES: Ethyl Hydroxybenzoate, Methyl Hydroxybenzoate, Propyl Hydroxybenzoate

Contains: Octyl Salicylate 4% w/w, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane 2% w/w, Octocrylene 1% w/w, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid 1% w/w.

Directions

Apply liberally and gently massage onto your face and neck.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
